[comment] This the special "flypage". When a page is called that corresponds to a part number in the database, and that page doesn't exist, this page is used to display it. Everywhere you see [item-code] the part number will be displayed. [item-field title] displays the title field in the products database. [item-data products title] is the same in this case, but if the products database contained more than one table (with ProductFiles) then [item-field title] could come from another table. [/comment]

[item-field title]

By [item-field artist]

[item-field comment]

Category: [item-field category]
Catalog Number: [item-code]
Our Price: [price code="[item-code]"] [if ordered [item-code]]

This item is currently in your shopping cart. [/if]

[if-item-field size] [calc] $qty = q{[cgi prospective_price]} || 1; return ''; [/calc]

[item-accessories size][item-accessories color] [else]
[order [item-code]]Order Now

[/else] [/if-item-field] [include pages/menubar]
